titles.title: Noose Hate Crime Act of 2008
Noose Hate Crime Act of 2008

To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for displaying nooses in public with intent to harass or intimidate a person because of that person's race, color, religion, or national origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Noose Hate Crime Act of 2008 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose a fine and/or prison term of up to two years on anyone who, with intent to harass or intimidate any person because of that person's race, religion, or national origin, displays a noose in public.
